title: Best of The Program | 10/11/21
description:
Pat plays a montage of Democrats claiming President Biden’s $3.5 trillion spending bill will actually cost $0. Pat takes some calls from listeners. Basketball player Kyrie Irving is throwing a kink in the league's vaccine requirement.
